channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro InterScan Messaging Security Virtual Appliance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro InterScan Messaging Security Virtual Appliance

item.title: CVE-2017-11392|2024-08-05T18:05:30.577Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20interscan%20messaging%20security%20virtual%20appliance
item.description: Proxy command injection vulnerability in Trend Micro InterScan Messaging Virtual Appliance 9.0 and 9.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations. The specific flaw can be exploited by parsing the "T" parameter within modTMCSS Proxy. Formerly ZDI-CAN-4745.

item.title: CVE-2017-11391|2024-08-05T18:05:30.490Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20interscan%20messaging%20security%20virtual%20appliance
item.description: Proxy command injection vulnerability in Trend Micro InterScan Messaging Virtual Appliance 9.0 and 9.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations. The specific flaw can be exploited by parsing the "t" parameter within modTMCSS Proxy. Formerly ZDI-CAN-4744.

item.title: CVE-2018-3609|2024-08-05T04:50:30.385Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20interscan%20messaging%20security%20virtual%20appliance
item.description: A vulnerability in the Trend Micro InterScan Messaging Security Virtual Appliance 9.0 and 9.1 management portal could allow an unauthenticated user to access sensitive information in a particular log file that could be used to bypass authentication on vulnerable installations.
